helpFindingRadioComponent.NEED_HELP_TEXT-1: Tune your radio dial to channel 0 and your Radio ID should display. If that doesn’t work, try accessing the menu function on your radio (refer to your owner’s manual for specific instructions).
helpFindingRadioComponent.NEED_HELP_TEXT-2: For some radios, you will need to press and hold the SAT or ESN button, or access your radio’s menu functions.

DeviceHelpComponent.TITLE: Lookup your Marine or Aviation Device ID
DeviceHelpComponent.MESSAGE: There are a few places you can look to find your Device ID.

UNORDERED_LIST.item-1: For most devices, access your Diagnostics or Settings menu, and then look for your Device ID to be listed.
UNORDERED_LIST.item-2: You may also look on the bottom of the device or the packaging for the Device ID. In many cases, you may find it next to the serial number.
UNORDERED_LIST.item-3: If your device also has audio capability, you may be able to tune to channel 0 and it will display your Device ID.

ValidateUserRadioComponent.MESSAGE: To protect your account from unauthorized access, we need to match the information in our system.
